name: Md Saifi Hassan
title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: Full Stack Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications

about.description1: As a software engineer with 3+ years in the industry, I've worked extensively with React, Node.js, and Golang to build production-ready applications. My experience spans from developing In-Flight Entertainment systems at Thales to creating scalable web platforms that serve thousands of users daily.
about.description2: I started my career after completing my B.Tech in Computer Science, where I won Smart India Hackathon twice. Since then, I've focused on full-stack development, working with modern technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, and cloud platforms. I enjoy tackling complex technical challenges and building software that performs well at scale.
